mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO COMMUNITY ( id, name, local_name, country_id, country_code, country_name, city_id, city_code, city_name, district_id, district_code, district_name, price, discount_price, title, local_title, description, address, file_id, cover_picture, room_count, grade, type_key, type, lease_type_key, lease_type, deposit_type_key, deposit_type, source_type_key, source_type, lease_model_key, lease_model, bathroom_type_key, bathroom_type, owner, owner_phone, owner_wechat, owner_email, supplier_id, supplier_name, pay_mode, room_type_key, room_type, route_description, advantage, tip, status, mark_count, experience_count, comment_count, longitude, latitude, video_url, sort_num, is_deleted, create_by, create_time, modify_by, modify_time ) VALUES ( null, #{name}, #{localName}, #{countryId}, #{countryCode}, #{countryName}, #{cityId}, #{cityCode}, #{cityName}, #{districtId}, #{districtCode}, #{districtName}, #{price}, #{discountPrice}, #{title}, #{localTitle}, #{description}, #{address}, #{fileId}, #{coverPicture}, #{roomCount}, #{grade}, #{typeKey}, #{type}, #{leaseTypeKey}, #{leaseType}, #{depositTypeKey}, #{depositType}, #{sourceTypeKey}, #{sourceType}, #{leaseModelKey}, #{leaseModel}, #{bathroomTypeKey}, #{bathroomType}, #{owner}, #{ownerPhone}, #{ownerWechat}, #{ownerEmail}, #{supplierId}, #{supplierName}, #{payMode}, #{roomTypeKey}, #{roomType}, #{routeDescription}, #{advantage}, #{tip}, #{status}, #{markCount}, #{experienceCount}, #{commentCount}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{videoUrl}, #{sortNum}, #{isDeleted}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{modifyBy}, #{modifyTime} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID FROM COMMUNITY LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE community SET IS_DELETED='Y' WHERE id = #{id}
